attributes.action: Give advice on shares bought into before the nationalisation of Bradford and bingley
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i made the mistake of buying into shares of bradford and bingley when i was asked to buy my free shares of 250 and increase my stake to 335 as a consequence.
i tried to get information from other sources in april this year but got no response, hence this route to see if i get any joy.
yours faithfilly
d h phillips

rejection.details: The petitions website is not the right avenue for your request for advice.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
